name: wponion
description: ~ Lightweight, Flexible & Rapid WP Development Framework ~

scripts.postinstall: gulp single --file "src/js/wponion-plugins.js" && gulp single --file "src/js/wponion-core.js" && gulp single --file "src/scss/wponion-plugins.scss" && gulp single --file "src/scss/wponion-base.scss" && gulp copy

author: varunsridharan
